html:
11.13.19  2:54 pm   I've been having this one feeling lately and I can't describe this feeling in words nor music. I don't know what to do. I really want to express this feeling. Any idea how to convey it? 

     you'll have to keep messing with words and/or music, not specifically to describe that thing, but you'll need to keep messing with words and/or music in general, over and over again, thoroughly, day after day. kind of like rolling in the mud. after a few rolls of mud you will notice the expressions start to take shape. then if you continue on like that for a few more short months and years, then you may reach a point where you'll start to feel like almost anything you can feel, you can express. don't take my word for it, ... well actually, you can take my word for it. it's true, that's why i'm saying it

11.13.19  2:48 pm   11.12.19  4:54 pm any tips for becoming even stronger & win this battle?

     sure

11.13.19  1:42 pm   how to interview for a job you don't really want

     experimentally

11.13.19  1:28 pm   You always talk about starting with 1 second songs and keep making them longer to learn how to make songs.  Could you do the same with videos as well?

     absolutely, and especially

      Or do you think the mediums are to different for it to work.
                            

     the 1 second song idea applies especially to the video aspect of songs. all of my shortest songs have been vidified, for this reason

11.13.19  1:19 pm   What is your opinion on potatoes

     it's like a lump. for dinner!

11.13.19  1:12 pm   What are some tips on writing songs? Because I want to start writing music.

     the best way to get started, is to try to write something that's not a song. songs actually don't like being songs. well .... they probably like it, but not when you ask them to. they prefer to surprise you. so if you ask a song to be a song, it will probably get restless and try to run away. so a certain level of reverse psychology is needed

11.13.19  12:24 pm   When will you wear wigs?

     as soon as possible

11.13.19  12:23 pm   When will you return to YouTube? I hope as soon as possible.

     i am having a count down timer

11.13.19  12:01 pm   So we have to wait 45 more days to See another video on your Chanell right? 

     hahahaha that would be some kind of miracle if i figured out what i was doing in only 45 days

11.13.19  11:04 am   Why is humanity

     would be so ridiculous

11.13.19  10:52 am   What happened to Old Zealand?

     it remains in the netherlands

11.13.19  10:48 am   Why is YouTube comment sections so toxic 

     to challenge the videos to be stronger

11.13.19  10:29 am   How cool are you?

     5 to 10 degrees

11.13.19  10:10 am   if potatoes and tomatoes had babies what would be their names?

     tornadoes

11.13.19  10:04 am   when will you release the sequel to "bookstacking" i have been eagerly awaiting it

     it was released at almost exactly the same time, and it's called chair flipping, or something like that. all this time waiting, but it seems you didn't even check to see if it was already there

11.13.19  9:57 am   How does it feel to chew 5 gum?

     i only did it once and i instantly got a bad headache, so i haven't tried it since then

11.13.19  9:54 am   why are a lot of your songs not on spotify? i would really like if "hey jodie foster" was on spotify, but if there is a reason it has not been put on spotify then it is ok i was just wondering the reason. like do you pick which of your songs are on spotify?

     ever since i've been on spotify, i've always put all the new songs on spotify, as they are released

11.13.19  9:50 am   What do you think of the mongolians?

     i don't think i have had a chance to meet them yet

11.13.19  8:38 am   Is the Earth as round as a Cube?

     getting there

11.13.19  8:17 am   how are you doing in land of 2 letter words

     wondering how all these words like 'doing' and 'letter' got here

11.13.19  8:17 am   How do i improve my country's economy as a citizen? 

     i think you'll have to either buy or sell stuff

11.13.19  7:48 am   So, I was thinking, there are so many insects in the world (over 10 quintillion, but whos counting), and they could rise up and destroy us all. Thinking about the issues in human culture today, the insects probably dont think highly of us. with that in mind, how do you feel about making a song praising mosquitos?

     ummmmmm

11.13.19  7:37 am   i still haven't found what i wanna do

     ok, keep doing things

11.13.19  6:45 am   What is your favorite flavor pie

     chocolate

11.13.19  6:24 am   is mt. st. helens gonna blow up?

     maybe later

11.13.19  4:41 am   Did you make the "might quit" video to scare us?

     no, i made it based on a friendly melody i heard in a dream. was trying to share the friendliness

11.13.19  4:31 am   Bill your music is sometimes very compicated rhythmically and harmonically, was 'Think I Might Quit' almost an exercise in just how many insane licks and mini detours you could take?

     no, i thought that was definitely one of the more normal ones

      I love that song man, I think it's your masterpiece btw.

11.13.19  3:15 am   what doesn't rhyme with fun

     nurbs

11.13.19  1:10 am   Bill i have a serious problem. Theres a song ive been meaning to make for a while. I hear a section of it very clearly wirh full srrangement in my mind. Thing is, guitar is main instrument mixwise and i dont play guitar or have friends whi i feel comfortable telling them what to play and nothing besides what i hesr in my head. I mean i like input and im open to the metamorphosis of my track, but i dont want to be pressured to be lax about my vision when the new ideas presented dont mix in with my vision. Noooooomsaying?

     what i would do in that situation, and i have done this, is just make the song with the tools you have. remember the golden rule, which is that any song can be played using any set of instruments. that's one of the most exciting things about songs, is how many different ways you can do them. my song 'new canaan' is a great example of a song that absolutely did not feel like a keyboard song. when i wrote it it seemed like it should be someone strumming a mandolin or banjo or something. possibly a stupid idea to try to do it with keyboards, but, thinking of the golden rule, i realized that i can

11.13.19  12:45 am   is "might quit" a joke or are you actually resigning from existence

     it's not a joke it's a song, but the song certainly never said anything like that

11.13.19  12:37 am   ahhhh the countdown timer is so exciting!! it makes me feel excited. does it make you feel excited?

     yes

11.13.19  12:14 am   Opinions on Dungeons?

     over priced

11.13.19  12:13 am   how do you include such random lines into your songs without it sounding weird? how do you get those ideas?

-person who asked you that question about mac & cheese

     my secret is to develop a strong integration with music. i've also spent a huge amount of time improvising, both in text and also in songs

11.13.19  12:04 am   what is the best time of the day or night to go out and ger groceries

     10 am

11.12.19  11:41 pm   I keep thinking about the state of the world and the growing issues in our society. I find it increasingly difficult to figure out how we are ever going to move forward with so many new troubles ahead. Given that, do you think dolphins are elitist?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      They just give me that vibe.

11.12.19  11:22 pm   How to do your homework without going and listening to your snogs?

     hmmmmmmmmmmm, you could try listening to race car noises instead

11.12.19  11:17 pm   how many good things must be done to make up for a bad thing and vice versa?

     2

11.12.19  11:07 pm   Am i a french canadian if i live in Quebec or am i a Quebec citizen?

     to answer that, i guess you'll have to figure out whether you are french

11.12.19  10:50 pm   do you double track your vocals?

     sometimes

      if no, how do you get such a nice wide stereo image of your voice

     double track and pan it to the sides

11.12.19  10:49 pm   Are you even considering making a song about numbers?

     i'm sure i've done that

11.12.19  9:36 pm   do you believe that there's other you in other universe you know like alternate universe?

     yes

11.12.19  9:28 pm   can you do a video about quantum physics

     that would be nice but i think it would take at least 100 years just to research it. i still may do it

11.12.19  9:05 pm   I've seen that when you are asked questions about your songwriting process, you tend to answer that you prefer to let the songs write themselves. Do you have the same kind of process for making videos like "maybe I could eat blades of grass" and "hi, i'm steve"? And if not, what is the process?

     those 2 videos definitely wrote themselves

11.12.19  8:38 pm   What is the meaning of a question?

     it's when you don't know something and you scream it at someone hoping they will help you some how

11.12.19  8:33 pm   What arE your views  on CHAIRS

     people should stand on them more often. incredible missed opportunity to see the world from a higher vantage point, perform soliloquys,

11.12.19  8:33 pm   Building on somebody else's question, what is your least favorite sandwich?

     can't wich

11.12.19  8:27 pm   when will you make a video on yt again? i miss u 

     i'm having a countdown timer

     woof

11.12.19  8:05 pm   youre my idol ok moving on. favorite type of cheese?

     LEGAL

     naaaaaaaaH.
